Question: Korea Semiconductor Industry Association (KSIA) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Korea Semiconductor Industry Association (KSIA)

CES 2024 Product Highlight

 - Unveiling cutting-edge AI chip technologies
 - Expansion of South Korean semiconductor sector in the global market
 - Implementation of the K-semiconductor strategy for supply chain excellence
 - $450B investment plan for the world's best semiconductor supply chain by 2030
 - Growth projection of the semiconductor market to $621.3 billion in 2024
 - SEMICON Korea 2024 event for industry growth and innovation at COEX, Seoul
 - SEDEX exhibition showcasing semiconductor materials, components, and equipment
 - Establishment of Korea System Semiconductor Forum for industry collaboration
Summary_cn:
韩国半导体产业协会（KSIA）

CES 2024产品亮点

- 揭示尖端人工智能芯片技术
- 扩大韩国半导体行业在全球市场的份额
- 实施K半导体战略，以优秀的供应链实现卓越
- 到2030年在全球建立价值4500亿美元的最佳半导体供应链的投资计划
- 预计半导体市场在2024年增长至6213亿美元
- 在首尔COEX举办SEMICON Korea 2024活动，推动行业增长和创新
- SEDEX展览展示半导体材料、组件和设备
- 成立韩国系统半导体论坛，促进行业合作
